author: etan_status
content:
`BeaconState` proof length is different, but it can probably be simplified, indeed.
<@425572898787426305> have you considered putting all the new fields for maxEB into a sub-`Container` to avoid the reindexing issue?
e.g. if all the new fields were in a new `state.validator_churn.foo` then the total fields in `BeaconState` would no longer hit a new power of 2 in Electra.
